entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Handle diagnostics from HostDiagnosticUpdateSource in LSP pull diagnostics mode #70188
  • Code Cleanup too aggressive with formatting of dotnet_diagnostic.CS0219 #70187

Closed

  • C# dynamic parameter influences handling methods return #70163
  • CS8509 (Switch is not exhaustive): Make it smarter. #70164
  • NRE in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70178

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ReferenceOutputAssembly="false" to language server dlls we don't ship #70195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T>" #70194
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update 'use collection expression' analyzer/fixer to support conversion when a capacity argument is passed. #70193
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: analyze nullability of element assignments #70192
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Fix VB features impacted by IOperation change #70191
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add Global prefix to VBCSCompiler mutex to make it visible on nix systems #70189
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Enable LSP pull diagnostics from Run Code Analysis command #70186
    Area-IDE, Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Synthesized members #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Small bits of cleanup in code actions #70190
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Set rollForward again #70180
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Re-enable static graph evaluation #70149
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Check for particular collection expr attribute by name, as it can be provided internally in packages #70179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Collection expressions: update better conversion from expression rule #70158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Avoid cycle caused by calculation of ObsoleteState/ExperimentalState. #70171
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Send batch events for DiagnosticsUpdatedArgs #70039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check constructor for conversion to IEnumerable collection #69956
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Collection expressions: use applicable EnsureCapacity() when length is known #70181
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
